Rosman and Resnick (1989) reviewed information from 34 cases of necrophilia describing the individuals' motivations for their behaviors: these individuals reported the desire to possess an unresisting and unrejecting partner (68%), reunions with a romantic partner (21%), sexual attraction to corpses (15%), comfort or overcoming feelings of isolation (15%), or seeking self-esteem by expressing power over a homicide victim (12%).<ref>Rosman, J. P., & Resnick, P. J. (1989). Sexual attraction to corpses: A psychiatric review of necrophilia. ''Bulletin of the American Academy of Psychiatry and the Law, 17,'' 153â163.</ref><!---WHAT are the demographics? Are all male or female? When and where are the stats being sampled from? Does it represent the worldwide view?--->
Rosman and Resnick (1989) reviewed information from 34 cases of necrophilia describing the individuals' motivations for their behaviors: these individuals reported the desire to possess an unresisting and unrejecting partner (68%), reunions with a romantic partner (21%), sexual attraction to corpses (15%), comfort or overcoming feelings of isolation (15%), or seeking self-esteem by expressing power over a homicide victim (12%).<ref>Rosman, J. P., & Resnick, P. J. (1989). Sexual attraction to corpses: A psychiatric review of necrophilia. ''Bulletin of the American Academy of Psychiatry and the Law, 17,'' 153â163.</ref><!---WHAT are the demographics? Are all male or female? When and where are the stats being sampled from? Does it represent the worldwide view?--->
â   â
It is often wondered why people may attempt such acts of disgusting desire. So we took this opppertunity to interview one man who has just been released from a high-security sex offenders jail in Verona, New Jersey. Darryl Wilson was caught in his dorm with a young ginger aduld watching intently with a video camera. The younger offender was let off as the court found Mr Wilson to have pressurized him by threats of "pumping his dead relatives". The interview as it happened:
  â   â   â
Journalist: "What were your first feelings when you realised you had this attraction?"
  â   â
Mr Wilson: "I just dont know. Was walking back from Harry's in the nungo and I saw a graveyard. And I also had the horn. So thought why not just jump on that bandwagon?"
  â   â
Journalist: "Do you have any regrets?"
  â   â
Mr Wilson: "Aye, one big yin... I didnae pump all your relatives!!!"
  â
Journalist: "On a serious note Mr Wilson,"
  â   â
Mr Wilson: "Somtimes i do actually wake up and wish I have a real gf. It must be great being able to have a two way conversation. And I'd imagine there gash smells better"
  â   â
Journalist: "Do you still have urges?"
  â   â
Mr Wilson: "Oh aye, talking aboot it has given me a healthy boner"
  â   â
